title: Understanding the Watch Window
text: The Watch Window is a tool in Excel that helps you monitor specific cells in your worksheet. It is particularly useful when you have a large spreadsheet and want to keep track of changes in certain cells without scrolling through the entire sheet.

title: Purpose of the Watch Window
text: Think about why you would want to monitor specific cells in a large spreadsheet. What kind of changes might you be interested in observing?

hintAnswer: keep an eye on cells that you identified as being related
title: Functionality of the Watch Window
text: The Watch Window allows you to keep an eye on cells that you identified as being related. This means you can monitor changes in these cells without having to navigate through the entire worksheet.
choices: keep an eye on cells that you identified as being related
watch others create changes on your worksheet
keep an eye on cells that Excel identifies as being related
